1. Title: Whispers of the Heart
2. Introduction: Setting the tone for contemplation and introspection
3. Stanza 1: The quiet night and a whispering heart
4. Stanza 2: Memories and reflections of love
5. Stanza 3: The pain of loss and the strength to move forward
6. Stanza 4: Hope and the promise of new beginnings
7. Conclusion: Embracing the whispers as guides to the future
